channel.title: Problem editing server ip and client
channel.description: heyy guys i have done portforwarding : Success: I can see your service on 77.127.56.125 on port (43594) Your ISP is not blocking port 43594 but the problem is im not that good to edit the server I mean..do i have to keep on the source (server listeining on port 0.0.0.0:43594) or i have to change it where i have to change to my ip addres ..my ip is 77.127.56.125 im using a [PI] server can you help me please :( ? i will give a co owner status on my server who help me note: i have done coding the server but i do know where to change to my ip addrees.

item.title: Problem editing server ip and client
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Turn off the firewall on your computer because it also blocks connections.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem editing server ip and client
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

and in server search for 0.0. and change to your ip.

btw for your client use 27.0.0.1 cause you can’t connect to you own ip, and next time don’t post your ip here

client sided.

search for server =
replace the ip with youre
compiler

item.title: Problem editing server ip and client
item.dc:creator: @raze9999 raze9999
item.description:
@raze9999 wrote:

heyy guys i have done portforwarding :
Success: I can see your service on 77.127.56.125 on port (43594)
Your ISP is not blocking port 43594
but the problem is im not that good to edit the server
I mean…do i have to keep on the source (server listeining on port 0.0.0.0:43594) or i have to change it
where i have to change to my ip addres …my ip is 77.127.56.125 im using a [PI] server
can you help me please ?
i will give a co owner status on my server who help me
note: i have done coding the server but i do know where to change to my ip addrees.
